snippet.title: GNOG Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
GNOG is a puzzle-adventure game about giant monster heads http://www.gnoggame.com

GNOG is a wondrous journey through a universe of visually stunning and playfully interactive monster heads. Each monster has its own personality, and a micro-world on its opposite side -- flip back and forth between these two sides, interacting with both to solve the puzzle. GNOG is a game by indie studio KO-OP.
Follow the development on Twitter: https://twitter.com/koopmode
